item.description:
Sometimes, just sometimes in life, you get a second chance.

Reggio in Weymouth was a favorite Italian restaurant of Mike's - one that he'd intended to bring the group to, at some point - until one day when it closed without warning. (We've actually been to its successor, Peppercornz on 18.) So, you can imagine his pleasant surprise when Reggio "reappeared" some time later in Norwell.

We hope you'll join us three days after Easter as we travel to Norwell and raise a glass to opportunities come round again.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Reggio Ristorante
Wednesday, April 11, 2012 @ 6:00 PM 
42Washington Street (Route 53)
Norwell, MA
(781) 982-5505

Website: Reggio Ristorante

Organizer: Mike

Guests: Yes. Two per member allowed. For questions about exceptions, please contact Mike.

Min/Max: Minimum of four by Monday, April 10th.

Price Range: Most entrees run between $14.00 and $18.00. Have a look at the online menu.

Event Fee: Current Annual Members - None, Group Members - $2.00, Guests - $2.00; $12 to become a 2012 Annual Member (Definitely worth it, especially if you plan to attend at least 5 more events this year.)

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over five years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

RSVP Deadline: Tuesday, April 10th @ 7:00 pm. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by the Event Organizer. Changes to "No" after the deadline will be considered No-Shows per our guidelines on the About Us Pages.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions: Reggio is located on Washington Street (Route 53) in Norwell, just south of the busy Queen Anne's Corner intersection, next to Taco Bell.
item.how_to_find_us: Our reservation is under both 'Mike' and 'South Shore Meetup Group'.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Second Chances
